complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Fix Settings Screen and Implement User Profile
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Settings Screen and User Profile implementation into subtasks covering UI repairs, profile data structure design, local storage implementation, dashboard integration, and navigation testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves both bug fixing and new feature implementation. It requires working with UI components, local storage (either AsyncStorage or SQLite), and integrating with the Dashboard. The complexity is moderate as it touches multiple parts of the application but uses familiar React Native patterns.
